# Professional blurb

I'm a product professional who has specialised in solving for gaps in growing markets.

For 20 years I created and helped take-to-market venture and technology solutions throughout Asia, the Pacific, Middle East and Africa.

Now I'm returning my experiences to my hometown of Gisborne, New Zealand.

I'm highly regarded for my breadth of skills, insights, and translation of ideas into hi- and low-tech ventures and products for persistent and emergent needs.

## Skill-set

My expertise is in venture and product design and development, product-led go-to-market strategy, pitching and proposing, strategic investment positioning, transactional and SaaS commercial modelling, and process optimisation.

With a focus on solutions for the underserved, I've performed multi-disciplinary roles across digital banking and payments, ad-hoc micro business and supply chain, education and social content platforms, government disbursements, international remittances, and real-time billing.
